EmailTemplate.name: Reg Update Webex Invite 11-2007
EmailTemplate.subject: You are invited to an ASA Regulatory Update via webex!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Join ASA!
Regulatory Update Webex
National FFELP guarantor American Student Assistance® has designed a regulatory update via webex.
Date and Time:
Monday 11/09/2007 1:00 p.m. - 3:00 p.m. EST
Course Description: An in-depth discussion on the anticipated changes that will result from Negotiated Rulemaking; both the General Provisions and loan issues including anticipated changes to our system. Our regulatory analysts will focus on any changes that we anticipate may impact your day-to-day job responsibilities. We want you to be prepared!
Who Should Attend
Any financial aid administrator interested in the most up to date information related to regulatory changes for 2008.
How You Will Benefit Know what changes to anticipate as a result of Negotiated Rulemaking. Learn what aspects of the act affect the way schools administers Title IV funds."
How to register or for additional information.
· Register Online at http://www.amsa.com/fap/training · Email: send your name, phone number and enrollment details to training@amsa.com · Phone: call the Training Department at (800) 999-9080, ext. 3099
All American Student Assistance training events are offered free of charge.
